channel.title: Philosophy-of-Mind on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy-of-Mind on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt

item.title: Neurobiological Theories of Consciousness: A Practical Map
item.description: A plain-language long-form guide to neurobiological theories of consciousness, covering each key thinker and concept in your map without filler.

item.title: Eliminative Illusionism: A Friendly Guide
item.description: A plain-language long-form guide to eliminative and illusionist approaches to consciousness, with clear explanations of each thinker in your map.
